duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with process walkthroughs to identify key activities, risks, and controls.
Apply risk and control concepts to assess control design and develop a test approach of the key controls.
Test the effectiveness of key controls identified.
Discuss and report control design deficiencies and controls not operating as designed.
Perform direct assistance (i.e., substantive testing) work on behalf of external auditors.
Perform special projects as deemed necessary by management.
Maintain organizational and professional ethical standards and ensure internal audit activities are carried out in compliance with the Standards.
Willingness to learn and enhance internal audit concepts and techniques.
Asks questions to better understand assigned tasks.
Listen to peers, managers, and clients.
Perform other functionally related duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree candidate, preferable in Management Information Systems, Accounting, and/or Internal Audit
